attributes.action: Ban Russia from all sporting events
attributes.additional_details: To show that we will not stand by and allow them to get away with this. Start sanctions in Sport
attributes.background: It is unjustifiable to allow Russia to compete in any sporting events when they are currently breaking international law by occupying Ukraine and killing innocent people. Let’s show them we will not tolerate this by isolating them from the sporting world.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who can compete in sporting events are a matter for the organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
